dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1074 IH: To repeal the Act entitled “An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of Iowa over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Sac and Fox Indian Reservation”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Blum (for himself, Mr. Young of Iowa, Mr. Loebsack, and Mr. King of Iowa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To repeal the Act entitled An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of Iowa over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Sac and Fox Indian Reservation.

section.text: That the Act of June 30, 1948, entitled An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of Iowa over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Sac and Fox Indian Reservation (62 Stat. 1161, chapter 759) is repealed.
